channel.title: Portforward PING problem <--------- help me plz :D
channel.description:
hey guys
ive a problem with portforwarding :S
plz dont tell me to watch on www.portforward.com cuz i did lot of times XD
k ive created a port on my router d-link dir 655 andd i download the port checker from portforward.com and it says port is open!! but they say also : we were not able to ping your router
and i was like yeaa portforwarded go fuck youself ping and i tryed it out on my laptop on the LAN from some guy in the street and it just cant connect
help me plox would appreacited it ( soz i am dutch if my english is to bad) ( and i putted my firewall off ) so its not the fire wall

hey guys
